entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Economy
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:50 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parrsboro 09:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 48 %
Dewpoint: -7.7°C
Wind: E 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Freezing rain or snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets this morning. Freezing rain beginning near noon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 3 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to snow mixed with ice pellets this evening. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then clearing. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 11 except minus 15 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 11 except minus 15 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
